name: Savory Bread Pudding
keywords: bread, milk, semisoft cheese, fall, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons butter or olive oil, plus more for greasing the pan
6 cups dense white bread, cut or torn into 1-inch chunks
4 ounces freshly grated semisoft cheese, like Emmenthal

recipeInstructions.text: Butter or oil an 8-inch souffle or baking dish, and put bread in it. Combine everything but shiitakes, and pour over bread. Submerge bread with a weighted plate, and turn oven to 350 degrees. Heat 2 tablespoons butter or oil in a saute pan, add shiitakes and saute until tender, about 10 minutes.
Remove plate, and stir in mushrooms. Bake until pudding is just set, 35 to 45 minutes.
